Data Handlers
==============

GoldenRetriever's knowledge bases can be preprocessed, parsed and uploaded into elasticsearch with the following subpackages.

Elasticsearch Interface
------------------------------------
.. automodule:: src.elasticsearch.create_doc_index
   :members: upload_docs
   :exclude-members: Version
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

------------------------------------

   :members:

   :show-inheritance:
